This resource would not be possible without the support and contributions of others, in particular the following:

- Gabriella Rossetti (MMU), Julie Lovegrove (Reading), Jon Gibbins (Reading) and Anastasia Christakou (Reading) as well as the rest of the HAVEN team for data
- Lei Zhang (Birmingham) for figures and feedback on the material


Run the code below!
```{webr-r}
#| context: interactive

finish_plot <- ggplot() +
  annotate("text", x = 0, y = 0.5, 
           label = "THANK YOU!", 
           size = 20, 
           fontface = "bold",
           color = "#2E86AB") +
  annotate("text", x = -0.3, y = 0.3, label = "✨", size = 10, color = "#F24236") +
  annotate("text", x = 0.3, y = 0.3, label = "✨", size = 10, color = "#F24236") +
  annotate("text", x = -0.2, y = 0.7, label = "🙏", size = 15, color = "#F6AE2D") +
  annotate("text", x = 0.2, y = 0.7, label = "😊", size = 15, color = "#F6AE2D") +
  annotate("text", x = 0, y = 0.2, 
           label = "", 
           size = 8, 
           fontface = "italic",
           color = "#666666") +
  theme_void() +
  theme(
    plot.background = element_rect(fill = "#F5F5F5", color = NA),
    plot.margin = margin(20, 20, 20, 20)
  ) +
  xlim(-0.5, 0.5) +
  ylim(0, 1)

print(finish_plot)
```
